name: Project Cell
description:
This game is an abstract experimental game that allows you to play with cellular automata. Please think of this as a ‘Bonsai’ game. 

The 'Bonsai' is always growing, so you cannot directly shape that, instead, you need to 'cooperate' with that, and enjoy the result. 

  • Mouse Left Button: Remove 3x3 cell
  • Mouse Right Button: Rotate Camera
  • Mouse Wheel: Change Camera Distance
